data.comment: The match is underway at Estadio do Maracana.
Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Free kick for Bragantino in the half of Fluminense.
In the minute 4, Throw-in high up the field for Bragantino in Rio de Janeiro.
Fluminense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 7, Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Bragantino.
Bragantino pushes forward through Claudinho, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 9, Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
Bragantino's Artur goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Bragantino to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
In the minute 11, Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Throw-in for Bragantino at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 14, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards the away team a throw-in.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Fluminense.
Throw-in for Fluminense close to the penalty box.
Free kick Fluminense.
In the minute 18, At Estadio do Maracana, Fluminense are penalized for being offside.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a Fluminense throw-in in Bragantino's half.
Bragantino drive upfield and Artur gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Fluminense defender.
In the minute 18, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a Bragantino throw-in in Fluminense's half.
Fluminense's Lucca is whistled for offside at Estadio do Maracana.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 22, Can Fluminense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bragantino's half?
Marcos Paulo (Fluminense) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 24, Throw-in Bragantino.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
Fluminense to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Fluminense in the half of Bragantino.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 31, Fluminense have a goal kick.
Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Fluminense in their own half.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
In the minute 35, Raul (Bragantino) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Claudinho's header is off-target for Bragantino.
Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
In the minute 37, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Fluminense.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 40, Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Artur is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Fluminense drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 42, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards the home team a throw-in.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Fluminense just outside Bragantino's area.
Bragantinoâ€™s Artur is on his feet again at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Fluminense in the half of Bragantino.
Bragantino to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
In Rio de Janeiro Fluminense attack through Nene. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Fluminense!
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
In the minute 45, Helinho (Bragantino) has been booked and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Luan Candido is booked for the away team.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade has blown to start the second-half.
Felippe Cardoso is replacing Nene for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 46, Odair Hellmann is making the team's second substitution at Estadio do Maracana with Luiz Henrique replacing Wellington Silva.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
Throw-in Fluminense.
In the minute 49, Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
Fluminense needs to be cautious. Bragantino have an attacking throw-in.
Bragantino have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 50, Artur (Bragantino) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Fluminense defenders.
Ball safe as Fluminense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Bragantino capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 51, Matheus Ferraz (Fluminense) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Helinho gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bragantino.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Bragantino in the half of Fluminense.
Matheus Martinelli (Fluminense) has received a first yellow card.
Artur for Bragantino gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards Fluminense a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Throw-in for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 58, Throw-in for Fluminense in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro, Marcos Paulo of Fluminense is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Bragantino have a goal kick.
In the minute 60, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a Fluminense throw-in in Bragantino's half.
Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 62, Throw-in Bragantino.
The home team have replaced Lucca with Caio Paulista. This is the third substitution made today by Odair Hellmann.
Fluminense's Caio Paulista breaks free at Estadio do Maracana. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 64, Goal kick for Bragantino at Estadio do Maracana.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Odair Hellmann (Fluminense) is making a fourth substitution, with Ganso replacing Marcos Paulo.
In the minute 66, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards Fluminense a goal kick.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a throw-in for Fluminense, close to Bragantino's area.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a throw-in for Bragantino, close to Fluminense's area.
In the minute 68, The away team replace Helinho with Bruno Tubarao.
Jan Hurtado is on a sub for Ytalo for Bragantino.
Fluminense needs to be cautious. Bragantino have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 70, Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 75, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Bragantino goal kick.
Fluminense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 77, Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a Bragantino throw-in in Fluminense's half.
Fluminense advance rapidly upfield but Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade blows for offside.
In the minute 80, Ball safe as Fluminense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
The match at Estadio do Maracana has been interrupted briefly for a check on Matheus Martinelli, who is down injured.
Matheus Martinelli is back on the pitch.
In Rio de Janeiro Bragantino drive forward through Claudinho. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 83, The home team has substituted Matheus Martinelli with Nascimento. Odair Hellmann is thus making his fifth change.
In the minute 84, Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
Felippe Cardoso (Fluminense) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
In the minute 85, Fluminense to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
Attention is being given to Bragantinoâ€™s Luan Candido and play has been suspended briefly.
Mauricio Barbieri is making the team's third substitution at Estadio do Maracana with Tomas Cuello replacing Artur.
In the minute 86, Mauricio Barbieri (Bragantino) is making a fourth change, with Edimar replacing the possibly injured Luan Candido.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 87, Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Fluminense.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 89, Free kick Fluminense.
Fluminense's Igor Juliao gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Bragantino.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade awards Bragantino a goal kick.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Throw-in for Fluminense in the half of Bragantino.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade signals a Fluminense throw-in in Bragantino's half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-0.
Mauricio Barbieri (Bragantino) is making a fifth substitution, with Vitinho replacing Claudinho.
Tomas Cuello (Bragantino) has received a yellow card from Dyorgines Jose Padovani de Andrade.
